Data: Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run fuller around off, just short of a yorker, punches it towards mid-on
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run fuller outside off, goes for the drive but cannot beat the extra cover fielder
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run fuller on the pads, flicked to the left of fine leg, Cummins moves across swiftly to keep it to one
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run length ball around off, stays in his crease and defends it towards mid-off
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run slower one, 117kph, fuller on the stumps, flicks it towards fine leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run length ball around off, punches towards mid-off
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length ball around off, dabs it on the off side and looks to sneak in but both the point and the cover fielders were quick to the ball

Cummins to S Dhawan, no run extra bounce for Cummins to beat Dhawan's attempted cut. Was a length ball around off, Dhawan went for it but no connection. There was an appeal for caught-behind from Cummins but no bat there
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run short of length around off, once again rising towards the batsman, stays back and defends it on the off side
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run fuller around off, punched firmly but cannot beat mid-off
Cummins to S Dhawan, FOUR runs short of length outside off, Dhawan takes half a step towards the leg side and ramps it over. Made sure he hit it away from the third man fielder this time
Cummins to S Dhawan, FOUR runs this time to the left of the third man. Short of length outside off, steered it behind point to finsih the over with back-to-back four
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run tossed up around off, comes forward and drives it towards sweeper cover
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run fuller and on the pads, flicked towards deep-backward square leg
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run fuller on the leg stump, driven towards long-on for another easy single
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run fuller on middle and leg, Dhawan pushes it towards deep midwicket
Zampa to Rahul, no run too full outside off, looks to squeeze it out fine, misses
Zampa to Rahul, no run length ball on middle and leg, defended from the front foot
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 wide fuller but way too outside off, Dhawan ignores it
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, FOUR runs length ball around off, punched square off the wicket, beating the backward point fielder and 50-run stand - off 54 balls - comes off with that four
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run length ball around off, defended towards covers this time
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run almost dabbed on to his stumps, a length ball around off, Rahul looks to defend with soft hands, off the face of the bat and onto the pads
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run length ball around off, looks to push towards covers, an inside edge towards square leg

Zampa to Rahul, FOUR runs fuller outside off, bowled from wide of the crease. Rahul looks to drive through extra cover. Gets a thick outside edge but does well to open the face of the bat so that the ball goes to the right of short third man
Zampa to Rahul, 1 wide length ball but sliding down the leg side
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run fuller around off, pushes it towards the sweeper cover from the front foot
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run fuller on the stumps, driven back towards the bowler
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run length ball around off, comes forward and defends it towards cover
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run length around off, defended again on the off side
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run short of length, Dhawan rocks back and pulls but cannot get the timing right. Short midwicket makes the stop
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run shortish in length, and slanting down the leg side, and he whips it along the ground towards fine leg
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run down the leg side, and he helps it along towards fine leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run length, slants into him, and he defends towards square leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, FOUR runs down the leg side, and he places this to the left of fine leg. Just a little roll of the wrists, and he knows he has placed this well enough. Top shot!
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run drives a length ball, leaning forward. It eludes the grasp of cover, who makes a half-stop. Easy single
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run cutter, around his pads, and he whips it off his pads towards fine leg
Agar to S Dhawan, no run floated up to middle, and he sweeps this hard. Cannot get it past short fine leg
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, angles across him before it straightens, and he blocks it
Agar to S Dhawan, no run chips down the wicket and tries to flick a length ball away. Cannot beat Finch at mid-wicket
Agar to S Dhawan, FOUR runs full ball, down the leg side, and he plays a little paddle sweep fine enough. Easy pickings, and bad ball!

Agar to S Dhawan, 2 runs slower, around off stump, and he nurdles it around the corner. Man at deep backward square leg has to run around to his left and pick it up near the long leg boundary, and they come through for the second

Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, and he plays this towards mid-off. He sets off, and then stops. Rahul stops after coming a few steps down the track. Dhawan can regain his composure and recover ground before the throw comes in at his end.
Zampa to Rahul, 2 runs short, and he goes back and cuts this hard. Gets it past point, but the man at the deep point fence is able to cut it off
Zampa to Rahul, no run floated in from deeper behind the popping crease, and he whips it towards mid-wicket
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run full, wide of off, and he slaps this hard towards the sweeper at deep point
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run full, around leg stump, and he looks to sweep. Cannot place it beyond short fine-leg
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run down the leg side, and he looks to sweep. Close to being called wide, but it might have just nicked part of his leg
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run wrong 'un, and he goes back and punches this towards long-on
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, turns back in from outside off, and he tries a delicate late cut. Cannot beat short third man
Agar to S Dhawan, 2 runs fuller, wider, and he runs it down towards deep point with a little flourish of the wrists. Fielded by deep backward point, away to his right
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, around off and middle, and he whips it away but straight towards square leg
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, and he presses forward to drive it back towards the bowler
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run steps out, and looks to slog this down the ground. Runs off the inner part of the bat and runs along the ground to long-on
Agar to Rahul, no run length, and he presses forward to defend this. Runs towards point, and he comes four-five steps down the wicket before being sent back
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run length, down the leg side, and he whips it away towards long leg. That's 50 for Dhawan!
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run length, driven down towards long-on
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run driven back to the bowler
Zampa to S Dhawan, FOUR runs slogs a fuller ball away towards deep mid-wicket. Does well to keep it well to the right of deep backward square
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run fuller, and he stretches forward to drive this down towards long-off
Zampa to Rahul, no run length, and he drives this towards cover
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, and he shuffles across to whip this away. Misses out on contact
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run dropped, but what an effort! Full ball, and he slaps it away low towards mid-wicket, where Warner dives to his right. Gets his fingers to it, but cannot hold on
Agar to Rahul, 1 run leans back and punches this towards the sweeper at extra cover
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run length, and he moves around the crease, before tapping this towards short third man
Agar to Rahul, 1 run fuller, a touch wider, and he steers this past point towards the man at deep point
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run flatter, straighter, and he goes back and punches this towards long-on
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, just around off, and he looks to whip this towards mid-wicket. Miscues a touch, but it goes along the ground towards long leg
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run full, and he drives this back towards long-on
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run length, and he comes down the wicket and punches this back down the wicket. Fielded by Zampa away to his left
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run drives back towards the bowler, who stops it well to his right
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run wrong 'un, and he flicks this towards deep mid-wicket
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run slower, outisde off, and he punches this towards deep point, opening the face of the bat, to retain strike
Agar to Rahul, no run length, and he hangs back to punch this towards point
Agar to Rahul, no run goes back to punch a ball that was fired in quicker, towards fine leg, and he misses out. Hits him too high on the pads though
Agar to Rahul, 1 run tries to run another one fired at his pads towards fine leg, but short fine leg keeps it down to just one
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run length, and punched towards sweeper cover
Agar to Rahul, no run drives a length ball towards cover
Agar to Rahul, no run length, defends off the back foot
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run length, a bit of width outside off, and he goes back to punch this towards deep point
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run fuller, and he drives this hard back down the pitch. Eludes Zampa, perhaps just scraping his fingers as it goes along. Allows long-on to cut this off
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run floated around leg stump, and he sweeps this towards long leg. Well done by the man at the deep backward square leg fence, moving away to his left
Zampa to Rahul, no run length, and he defends towards point
Zampa to Rahul, 2 runs short, quicker, and he whips it with the turn towards deep backward square. Some hard running fetches the batsmen two
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run full, and he looks to hit this hard down the ground, Cannot get under the ball as he would like, and ends up driving it to long-on
Agar to Rahul, no run length, and he defends this towards point
Agar to Rahul, 1 run length, and he stretches forward to drive this towards sweeper at cover

Agar to S Dhawan, SIX runs down the wicket, and chips this over the long-off fence. Use of the feet the key, as the line of the ball was wide, but all he needed to do was clear the infield, with the man stationed at mid-off
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run tapped away towards square leg for a quick single
Agar to Rahul, 1 run chips down the wicket, and drives a length ball towards long-off
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, and he shuffles across to defend this right at the crease
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run fuller, just around off, and he drives this hard towards sweeper at cover
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run length, and he slaps this towards deep mid-wicket. On the bounce towards the fielder in the deep
Zampa to Rahul, no run shorter, and he goes back and drives it back towards the bowler
Zampa to Rahul, no run length, driven back towards the bowler

Zampa to Rahul, no run this is interesting. The ball goes through Rahul, looks to have taken a little tickle, and then Carey comes up with a good take. Australia appeal but the umpires refer this to television. The soft signal is not out! It bounces on its way through to Carey. Shall stay not out
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run length, driven out towards sweeper cover
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run fuller length, and he plays a gorgeous drive, just to the left of mid-off. Cummins fields and has a shy at the non-striker's end. Just misses, though Rahul was well in
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run short, scrambled-seam from the look of things, and he plays it towards point. A slight misfield, and the ball does go wide enough to allow a run to be pinched
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run length, punched towards deep point
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run slower ball, fuller, and he drives this towards mid-on
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run short ball, slower through the air, and he slaps this towards deep mid-wicket
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run length, and he opens the face of the bat to run it towards deep point

Agar to Rahul, OUT GONE! Chips a length ball in the air, just doesn't get to the pitch of one floated around off. Perhaps gripped a bit on the pitch too, and he just drives this straight to Steve Smith at cover. Loud cheers, as the crowd prepare for Virat Kohli
Agar to Kohli, 1 run drives hard towards long-off, with a good forward stride in towards the ball
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, down the leg side, and he sweeps, and again plays it straight to short fine-leg
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 leg bye length, and he tries to flick this. Off his pads, towards short fine-leg and they quickly switch ends for a leg-bye
Agar to Kohli, no run length, and he stretches to drive towards cover
Agar to Kohli, 1 run fired in flatter, and he goes back and drives this towards long-on
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run length, and he taps this towards point and sets off. There's a shy at the striker's end, and Dhawan just about makes it! No direct hit, at any rate
Cummins to S Dhawan, 1 run fuller length, and he whips this away towards long leg. One bounce to the fielder stationed there
Cummins to Kohli, no run full ball, wide of the off stump, and Kohli fails to make contact as he looks to swipe it away. Within the tramlines
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run length, and he drives this towards sweeper cover

Cummins to S Dhawan, OUT Dhawan goes! Must have been a change of pace, because Dhawan got that nowhere near where he wanted to play it. Just looks to flick it away, and the outside edge carries it towards cover. Ashton Agar runs in from mid-off and takes a good, diving catch away to his right. The set man is gone, as the bowling change makes a difference immediately for Finch!
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run reaches out to a length ball around off, and runs it down towards third man
Zampa to Kohli, 2 runs wrong 'un, down the pads, and Kohli whips it away towards deep backward square
Zampa to Kohli, no run length, flicks it away towards mid-wicket
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run length, and he pushes this towards long-off
Zampa to Iyer, 1 run length, driven towards sweeper cover
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run length, strays a touch down the pads, and he can flick it towards square leg
Zampa to Iyer, 1 run flighted, around off, and he drives this towards sweeper cover
Cummins to Iyer, 1 wide dug in short, and Iyer ducks out of the way. Called wide for the length
Cummins to Iyer, no run length, driven back hard towards Cummins, who stops it with his right hand. Had Kohli scrambling, just in case that had gone back to the stumps at the non-striker's end
Cummins to Iyer, no run length, defended on the off side
Cummins to Iyer, no run length, bowled at 145kph, and he defends this from the crease
Cummins to Iyer, 1 run length, played away towards deep square leg
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run length, just runs off the outside edge as Kohli has a nibble at it. Evades slip, and goes along the ground down to third man
Cummins to Iyer, no run short, well-directed, and he weaves away to avoid this one
Zampa to Kohli, SIX runs very short ball, and gets the right treatment! Rocks back, and swings this over the long leg fence. Just went over, in the end, but good enough to fetch half a dozen

Zampa to Kohli, OUT he's gotten his revenge! Kohli falls to Zampa again! Driven hard, to a ball that was floated around off, and he just couldn't keep it away from Zampa, who takes a sharp chance and then punches the air. Important breakthrough for Australia at this stage, as it exposes the relatively soft underbelly of the Indian batting, with a good way to cover in this innings
Zampa to Pant, FOUR runs tossed up around off, and Pant comes forward and smashes this googly through covers
Zampa to Pant, no run fuller around off, nudges it back towards the bowler
Zampa to Pant, no run length ball on the stumps, stays back and turns it on the leg side
Zampa to Pant, 1 run fuller on the stumps, driven to the left of the bowler for a single to long-on
Starc to Pant, no run fuller around off, punches it back towards the bowler
Starc to Pant, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards deep square leg
Starc to Iyer, 1 run a short one to put Iyer in a tangle. Was on middle and leg and Iyer found himself fending at it in an awkward position, a single as the ball drops on the leg side
Starc to Pant, 1 run length ball at the stumps, flicked towards backward square leg

Starc to Iyer, OUT and the move to bring Starc back has worked. Don't think it was a special delivery though, a length ball angling away, Iyer pushes away from the body and gets an outside edge, a simple catch for Carey behind the stumps

Starc to Jadeja, no run goes for the yorker, just outside off. Jadeja jams his bat at it, but the ball hardly goes anywhere. He was looking to run a single but Starc was quick in his followthrough to prevent it
Zampa to Pant, no run length ball outside off, goes for the cut but cannot beat short third man
Zampa to Pant, no run a touch fuller and flatter outside off, left alone
Zampa to Pant, no run a googly, length outside off, cuts it towards backward point
Zampa to Pant, 1 run low full toss outside off, drives it towards wide long-off
Zampa to Jadeja, no run another googly. Wide outside off, lunges forward and pushes it towards covers
Zampa to Jadeja, 1 run a full toss outside off, Jadeja works it towards long-on
Starc to Jadeja, no run length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
Starc to Jadeja, no run fuller on the stumps, flicked but cannot beat short midwicket
Starc to Jadeja, no run length ball outside off, left alone
Starc to Jadeja, 1 run slower one at 128.8kph, length outside off. Jadeja comes forward and pushes it into the covers
Starc to Pant, 1 wide 144kph, attempted yorker but down the leg side, given a wide
Starc to Pant, 1 run gets the yorker right this time, but Pant manages to get some bat on it, an inside edge onto the pads. An appeal for lbw but they run a single to fine leg
Starc to Jadeja, no run another attempt for the yorker but this time Starc ends up bowling a full toss at the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
Agar to Pant, 1 wide length but down the leg side, Pant looks to sweep it fine but misses
Agar to Pant, no run length ball at the stumps, punched towards short midwicket from the back foot
Agar to Pant, no run length ball at the stumps, goes back but mistimes the pull towards short fine leg
Agar to Pant, no run length ball at the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket
Agar to Pant, 1 run length ball on the pads, flicked towards deep-backward square leg

Agar to Jadeja, SIX runs fuller, angled across the batsman. Jadeja goes down and slog sweeps it over deep midwicket. For a moment it looked like the fielder at the boundary had a chance but it kept sailing and cleared him comfortably
Agar to Jadeja, no run length ball at the stumps, flicked towards square leg
Starc to Pant, no run length ball around off and middle, turned to the leg side
Starc to Pant, 1 run short of length outside off, stays back and dabs it towards third man
Starc to Jadeja, no run length but way outside off, Jadeja lets it go through to the keeper

Starc to Jadeja, FOUR runs short of length outside off, Jadeja just steers it behind point, Zampa with the desperate dive to his left at third man, he gets his hand but Starc's pace means it's travelling way too fast for him to stop it
Starc to Jadeja, 1 run length ball on the pads, flicked behind square on the leg side
Starc to Pant, no run fuller and wider outside off, left alone
Agar to Jadeja, no run length ball around off, punched back towards the bowler who fumbles. Jadeja was looking for a single but the mid-on fielder was quick to tidy it up
Agar to Jadeja, no run length ball on the pads, too quick for Jadeja to pull it, ends up dabbing behind the stumps
Agar to Jadeja, no run flatter and quicker at the stumps, flicked towards short midwicket
Agar to Jadeja, no run length ball on the pads, misses the pull and is hit on the pads
Agar to Jadeja, no run gives himself some room and goes for the pull, the ball lobs towards short midwicket, Jadeja was looking for the run but Pant wisely sends him back
Agar to Jadeja, no run and that's a maiden. Length ball at the stumps, punched towards extra cover
Cummins to Pant, no run length ball outside leg and angling in, Pant misses the flick and is rapped on the pads. An appeal for lbw but Cummins realises it had pitched outside leg
Cummins to Pant, no run fuller and wider outside off, pushes it towards covers
Cummins to Pant, 1 run fuller but down the leg side, clipped towards fine leg
Cummins to Jadeja, no run length ball around off, stays back and defends towards extra cover
Cummins to Jadeja, no run length ball at the stumps, gives himself room and looks to go over the top with both mid-on and mid-off inside the circle. Mistimes though and it bounces it towards mid-on

Cummins to Jadeja, 2 runs short of length outside off, dabs it towards the left of the third man, and he is sprinting back for the second. A direct hit and they are checking upstairs. Richardson is the fielder but Jadeja was dragging his bat and was well inside
Agar to Pant, 1 run short and down the leg side, Pant goes for the pull but only a single to fine leg, missed out there
Agar to Jadeja, no run length ball angling across, looks to punch off the back foot, gets beaten
Agar to Jadeja, 2 runs this time connects the punch and scampers back for the second as the ball goes towards sweeper cover
Agar to Jadeja, 1 run fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards long-on
Agar to Pant, 1 run short of length down the leg side, once again pulled towards fine leg
Agar to Jadeja, FOUR runs length but room outside off, Jadeja waits for it and cuts it behind point for four
Kane Richardson to Pant, no run fuller around off, drives it towards covers
Kane Richardson to Pant, 1 run fuller and wider, drives it towards sweeper cover, the bottom hand comes off the bat
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, 1 run short of length around off, gets on his toes and drops it on the off side for a quick single
Kane Richardson to Pant, no run play and a miss. A length outside off, Pant looks to smash it over extra cover but loses his shape, fails to connect
Kane Richardson to Pant, 1 run length ball down the leg side, goes for the pull but cannot middle it, the ball bounces to the right of Carey
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, 1 wide length ball down the leg side, Jadeja looks to flick it fine but misses. Called a wide
Kane Richardson to Jadeja, 1 run length ball around off, opens the face of the bat to run it towards third man, 200 comes up for India
Agar to Jadeja, 1 leg bye length ball on the pads, misses the flick but hares down to the other end for a leg-byw
Agar to Pant, SIX runs 102kph, uses his feet and hoicks it over deep midwicket, all the way for a six
Agar to Pant, 1 run a full toss this time, 105kph. Slapped towards deep midwicket
Agar to Jadeja, no run another full toss, 102.7kph. Jadeja misses out. Finds short midwicket
Agar to Jadeja, 1 run fuller on the pads, clipped towards midwicket
Agar to Pant, FOUR runs 103.1kph, walks towards the bowler once again and absolutely drills it between deep midwicket and long-on

Kane Richardson to Jadeja, OUT length ball at the batsman, was a knuckle delivery, bounces extra as well. Jadeja was looking to run it down towards third man but the ball hits near the shoulder of the bat and an easy catch for Carey
Kane Richardson to Thakur, 1 run fuller outside off and absolutely smoked towards deep cover, there is a sweeper though
Kane Richardson to Pant, 1 run slower length ball outside off, opens the face of the bat for a single to third man
Kane Richardson to Thakur, no run fuller around off, flicks it towards mid-on
Kane Richardson to Thakur, no run short of length outside off, goes for the pull but cannot middle it, lobs in the air but falls well short of mid-on
Kane Richardson to Thakur, 1 run short of length outside off, cuts it towards sweeper cover for one
Cummins to Thakur, 1 run fuller on the pads, clipped behind square leg

Cummins to Pant, OUT a short one hurries onto the Pant who goes for the pull, gets a top edge onto the helmet and it lobs towards point. An easy catch but umpire Shamshuddin is unmoved as everyone looks towards him. Meanwhile, the batsmen are sneaking in single, no direct hit but then the umpire raises his finger. Pant departs after a bit of drama
Cummins to Shami, 1 run length ball on the pads, flicked behind square leg
Cummins to Thakur, FOUR runs fuller around off, drives it aerially and just to the left of extra cover, neat connection though and he gets four
Cummins to Thakur, FOUR runs short but down the leg side, pulls it fine for another boundary, crucial runs these
Cummins to Thakur, 1 run short of length at the batsman and another good short, pulled towards in front of square leg, keeps the strike with that single

Starc to Thakur, 1 run dropped. A full toss at the stumps and lofted towards long-on, not from the middle of the bat. Richardson charges in, a low chance but should have been taken, slips through his fingers

Starc to Shami, no run Michael Gough gives it lbw. Shami though wants to review it. Has to. A yorker from around the wicket, Shami misses the flick and it hits him right on the shoe. No bat involved but looks like it was going down. Replays show the impact was in the line of the leg stump but the angle would have taken it down. Shami survives
Starc to Shami, no run another attempted yorker, just outside off this time, Shami looks to drive but misses
Starc to Shami, 1 run fuller at the stumps, Shami gets his bat on it this time, driven towards sweeper cover

Starc to Thakur, OUT nails the yorker, it was just a matter of time, Shardul fails to get anything on it and the off stump has been knocked out from its groove. The fact that Shardul was looking to play across the line didn't help either t
Starc to Kuldeep, 1 run a low full toss around off and middle, flicked towards deep square leg
Cummins to Kuldeep, no run length ball in the channel, looks to defend but ends up playing inside the line
Cummins to Kuldeep, 1 run length ball on the pads, flicked towards deep midwicket
Cummins to Shami, no run length ball at the batsman, a bit of extra bounce as well. Defended from the crease
Cummins to Shami, 1 run length ball at the stumps, backs away and goes down the ground. Fails to middle it as it goes over the umpire's head
Cummins to Kuldeep, 1 run pushed towards covers for a quick single
Cummins to Shami, no run fuller outside off and Shami backing away made it look wider than it was. No connection as he tries to reach out for it
Starc to Kuldeep, 1 run fuller outside off, drives it towards deep extra cover
Starc to Shami, 1 run fuller outside off, looks to go over covers by giving himself room. A thick outside edge towards third man
Starc to Kuldeep, no run fuller outside off, pushes it towards cover
Starc to Kuldeep, no run fuller outside off, pushed towards extra cover
Starc to Kuldeep, 1 run fuller on the stumps, swiped towards square leg
Starc to Shami, FOUR runs 142kph, gets the timing right. Goes for the yorker but ends up bowling a full toss, hits it through covers for four
Kane Richardson to Kuldeep, no run slower length ball outside off, looks to push on the off side, misses
Kane Richardson to Kuldeep, 1 run length ball outside off, steered towards third man
Kane Richardson to Shami, 1 run short of length at the stumps, Shami back away and pulls it towards deep midwicket

Kane Richardson to Kuldeep, 1 run slower length ball, backs away and tucks it towards midwicket, Richardson chases himself but Shami is charging down for the second. The throw is at the wrong end and there is enough time for Shami to retrace his steps
Kane Richardson to Shami, no run length ball outside off, backs away and looks to slog, misses
Kane Richardson to Shami, no run short of length outside off, gives himself room and looks to smash over extra cover, beaten again
Starc to Kuldeep, FOUR runs fuller ball around off, Kuldeep makes some room and steers it through covers for four
Starc to Kuldeep, 1 wide fuller but way down the leg side
Starc to Kuldeep, 1 run length ball on the pads, clipped towards fine leg
Starc to Shami, 1 run fuller at the stumps who backs away and pushes it towards long-on, 250 comes up for India
Starc to Kuldeep, FOUR runs a length ball around off, Kuldeep backs away and smashes it over the bowler's head, gets a boundary
Starc to Kuldeep, 1 run fuller around off, squeezes it out on the off side and sprints to the other end

Starc to Shami, OUT a direct hit from Smith and Kuldeep has to go back. Fuller outside off, Shami steered it towards backward point and set off, Smith had all the time to nail the direct hit and he does

Kane Richardson to Shami, OUT length ball at the stumps, backs away and looks to smash across, gets a top edge that goes high and behind the stumps, Carey positions himself under it as it comes spiralling down, the ball pops out of his gloves but he does well to cling to the rebound, between his chin/neck and the glove
Starc to de Kock, no run fullish around off stump, 137kph/85mph and de Kock is across, taps softly towards point
Starc to de Kock, 1 run length on the stumps, straightens a touch as de Kock works across the line, nudged into a gap at midwicket for one
Starc to Hendricks, 1 run good length again, 136kph and curling int the pads as Hendricks works through midwicket, they think about a second... but de Kock turns it down as Agar comes in off the rope
Starc to de Kock, 1 run full and scooped out down towards third man
Starc to Hendricks, 1 wide full and leg side, 140kph/87mph... but off beam
Starc to Hendricks, no run pitched up around leg stump, pushed towards mid-on coming forwards
Starc to Hendricks, no run full on the stumps, 142kph/88mph and Hendricks opens the face slightly to punch square
Cummins to de Kock, no run charges in and hits a length, bowling over the wicket and de Kock steers towards point
Cummins to de Kock, SIX runs smoked! Length ball from Cummins and de Kock mows it into the crowd at deep midwicket! Carved brutally over the leg side for the first boundary of the day
Cummins to de Kock, no run Cummins adjusts, punched into the off side
Cummins to de Kock, SIX runs lapped over fine leg, goes all the way! Extraordinary from Quinny, who shuffled across and flipped it casually behind square, using Cummins' pace again
Cummins to de Kock, 1 run slower ball, nudged into a gap on the off side
Cummins to Hendricks, 1 run length ball, 137kph/85mph and angling in with the arm, Hendricks settles for turning it around the corner for one
Starc to Hendricks, no run fullish outside off, 141kph/88mph and Hendricks mistimes a drive into the leg side
Starc to Hendricks, FOUR runs launched over cover! Not much swing and Hendricks hits merrily on the up for his first boundary. Coming on crisply today
Starc to Hendricks, 1 run shorter length and dabbed down into the turf behind square on the off side
Starc to de Kock, SIX runs heaved into the crowd again! Short from Starc, sweet from de Kock, who swipes up and over deep backward square leg
Starc to de Kock, no run pitched up, skidding into the pads and Starc goes up... heading leg side, though
Starc to de Kock, 1 run big tail in, full at 147kph/91mph and again de Kock takes it on the boot, missing leg stump by a distance and they scurry the leg bye
Kane Richardson to de Kock, FOUR runs gets the scoop away fine, off the edge of the bat but it'll run to the rope!
Kane Richardson to de Kock, FOUR runs smacked off a length back down the ground! Length ball, 131kph/81mph and de Kock just whacks it
Kane Richardson to de Kock, 1 leg bye back of a length, de Kock attempts to scoop it fine again, takes this one on the body
Kane Richardson to Hendricks, no run slower ball, Hendricks picks out a fielder
Kane Richardson to Hendricks, no run pace off again, Hendricks fiddles and gets an edge that dies in front of Carey
Kane Richardson to Hendricks, 1 run shortish outside off, steered through point
Cummins to Hendricks, no run comes across and steers to backward point
Cummins to Hendricks, 2 runs pitched up, 142kph/88mph and Hendricks leans into a square drive, well hunted down on the rope by Smith, who leaps acrobatically to pull it in
Cummins to Hendricks, no run full in the channel, Hendricks closes the face a touch early and taps back to the bowler
Cummins to Hendricks, 2 runs short length on the body, turned through square and he wants two... well run as the throw comes in
Cummins to Hendricks, 1 run back of a length outside off, 142kph/88mph and dabbed down towards cover point
Cummins to de Kock, 1 run tapped down into a gap
Zampa to de Kock, no run pushed through and there's a stifled appeal

Zampa to de Kock, 1 run smashed over deep midwicket for six SMITH!! You cannot do that... Brilliantly caught on the boundary as he dives beyond the rope, and then hurled back in before touching the ground! Keeps them to one! Amazing
Zampa to Hendricks, 1 run tossed up and worked for a single
Zampa to de Kock, FOUR runs short and this time de Kock thumps it into a gap for four! Crunched squarer and Smith won't get around this time
Zampa to de Kock, SIX runs downtown! De Kock is on one... Steps out and creams this back over the straight boundary for six more!
Zampa to de Kock, 1 run goes up and over again, this is more of a scoop leg side and it plugs for a couple behind square
Kane Richardson to de Kock, no run punched for a single
Kane Richardson to de Kock, 1 run length ball on middle and off, driven down the ground for one

Kane Richardson to Hendricks, OUT short ball, pace off... and pulled to deep square leg! Laboured innings from Hendricks, who was done by the legcutter from Richardson, bowling well to his field. Safely taken by Dre Russ/Sir Jaddu in the outfield
Kane Richardson to de Kock, 1 run length ball, stroked back down the ground to long-off
Kane Richardson to du Plessis, no run Faf comes across and pokes into the covers
Kane Richardson to du Plessis, 1 run off the mark with a punch to mid-on
Agar to du Plessis, 3 runs short and wide and slapped through the covers, looks four all the way until Starc throws himself full length to drag it in
Agar to de Kock, 1 run floated up and worked around the corner
Agar to du Plessis, 1 run tries to come down, Agar shortens his length, tapped square on the off side
Agar to de Kock, 1 leg bye darted on the stumps, straightening a touch and skids into the pads as de Kocks sweeps... not given and there'll be no review
Agar to du Plessis, 2 runs du Plessis works this into a gap at midwicket for a couple
Agar to du Plessis, no run fired down at 104kph an Faf bunts it back to the bowler
Zampa to de Kock, 1 run goes back and steers towards point, this could be tight at the bowler's end... but the throw misses! De Kock was well out of the frame
Zampa to du Plessis, 1 run lobbed up and whipped leg side on the full
Zampa to de Kock, 1 run lashed towards extra cover coming forwards, cut off but they scurry through
Zampa to du Plessis, FOUR runs another full toss, du Plessis swings hard, edges past short third man! Squirted away to the rope, a welcome boundary
Zampa to du Plessis, no run chopped off the back foot, faf has to return to his crease in a hurry
Zampa to du Plessis, 1 run flatter delivery, sliding through and jabbed to midiwicket
Agar to du Plessis, 1 run dotted on off stump, Faf tucks it back down the ground
Agar to de Kock, 1 run flighted, swept off the stumps for one through backward square leg
Agar to du Plessis, no run pushed through, stays down a touch as du Plessis chops down on it
Agar to du Plessis, 1 run fast and flat outside off, chopped for one through backward point
Agar to de Kock, no run nicely bowled, arm ball and it slips past the outside edge as de Kock drops back. He seems to have stalled in the last few overs
Agar to de Kock, no run tossed up and this time de Kock clouts it into his front boot looking for a big hit

Cummins to du Plessis, OUT length ball, slugged over the covers, picks out the sweeper! A cutter from Cummins to start off with and du Plessis completely mistimes it, Richardson has to run in a few paces to take a straightforward catch. Failed to get going this time, Faffing around to no good effect
Cummins to de Kock, 1 run another slower ball, dabbed into the covers - that's Quinny's fifty, roundly applauded by the PE crowd
Cummins to van der Dussen, 1 run shortish on the stumps, 144kph/89mph and Rassie sits deep, works it square on the leg side
Cummins to de Kock, FOUR runs on the stumps, smeared through backward square leg! Pace on, cross-seamer from Cummins, but it goes skimming away as de Kock swings across the line
Cummins to de Kock, 1 run slower delivery again, outside off and poked through the covers
Cummins to van der Dussen, no run banged in at 140kph/87mph and RVD? bails out of his pull shot
Zampa to de Kock, 1 run lobbed up and worked into the leg side
Zampa to van der Dussen, 1 run too full, van der Dussen is down low and reverses it for one, Cummins doing well to stop it squirting past him at short fine leg
Zampa to de Kock, 1 run lobbed up, de Kock reverse-sweeps too, straight to short third man and they scamper through
Zampa to van der Dussen, 1 run lobbed up, the legbreak straightens and hits the inside edge, runs square on the leg side
Zampa to de Kock, 2 runs works this with the spin into a gap at square leg, they run well for a couple
Zampa to de Kock, 1 run flighted, still can't get hold of Zamps this over, tapped for one in front of point
Kane Richardson to de Kock, no run length ball outside off, de Kock mistimes a chop into the ground, Richardson fields in his follow-through
Kane Richardson to de Kock, 1 run pace off again, doesn't get hold of a pull and it bobbles down to long-on - right off the toe of the bat, in fact
Kane Richardson to van der Dussen, 1 run length ball on off, another cutter and it's dabbed in front of square for another single

Kane Richardson to de Kock, 1 run completely foxed, attempts to scoop and it loops up over his head... but lands in no-man's land! Carey was the man trying to get across towards short fine leg, but the ball fell safely, not that Quinny knew much about it
Kane Richardson to van der Dussen, 1 leg bye smacks into the thigh and deflects behind point... Richardson liked it, but that looked very high, to me. No inclination to review
Kane Richardson to de Kock, 1 run chopped towards backward point
Agar to de Kock, no run de Kock exclaims in frustration as he attempts to reverse-sweep and misses outside off stump
Agar to de Kock, FOUR runs tossed up and he sweeps, gets it past short fine leg... and scoots away for a welcome four! Agar seemed to think that was a catch, initially
Agar to de Kock, 1 run swings hard across the line, top-edged over the keeper! De Kock has just got stuck in treacle here, but it lands safely again
Agar to van der Dussen, SIX runs smeared into the stands! Timely blow from Rassie, who is down on one knee to munch this over deep midwicket
Agar to van der Dussen, 1 run pushed through, tapped down into the off side
Agar to de Kock, 1 run floated up outside off, punched to the cover sweeper coming forwards
Zampa to de Kock, 1 run skips down and clobbers this on the full, just out of Zampa's reach for one to long-off, where Starc hurls it in to keep them to one
Zampa to van der Dussen, no run pushed through and chopped into the covers
Zampa to van der Dussen, SIX runs pongo! RVD? hammers another Dorothy Dix over deep square leg! That has been fetched over the giant screen! They're going to need a new ball, here
Zampa to van der Dussen, 1 run flatter, picks off the single

Zampa to de Kock, OUT done in the flight, skied on the drive... and well taken running in from long-off! De Kock has been battling for a while, and now he's sent packing by Zampstagram with some picture-perfect flight and dip. Got nowhere near middling that shot, and Starc did brilliantly to take the catch
Zampa to van der Dussen, 1 run pushes through the googler, jabbed to square leg
Agar to van der Dussen, 1 run fired into the pads and flicked fine
Agar to Miller, 1 run flat trajectory, Miller just works it to midwicket for a first run
Agar to van der Dussen, 1 run pushed through outside off and punched square on the off side
Agar to Miller, no run quicker still, skids through past the outside edge as Miller hangs back
Agar to Miller, 1 run tossed up, comes forward and drives to long-on
Agar to van der Dussen, 1 run full, in the blockhole and Rassie can only work it away through the leg side to deep midwicket
Starc to van der Dussen, 1 run fullish length ball and tucked to leg
Starc to Miller, 1 run lets go a full toss, only 133kph/82mph - so maybe he isn't 100% - and Miller nearly misses it, deflected fine on the leg side

Starc to van der Dussen, FOUR runs fired full outside off, van der Dussen gets a toe-end on it... screws away through backward point! Flew between two men, and there's no protection on the rope at third man
Starc to van der Dussen, no run pitched up and bunted into the covers
Starc to van der Dussen, FOUR runs another full toss, belted through square leg! Attempted slower ball but served up to be dispatched on the pull
Starc to van der Dussen, 1 run pitched up at 141kph/88mph, jabbed towards short third man
Cummins to van der Dussen, 1 run pitched up, 143kph/89mph and driven hard to mid-off, van der Dussen was scrambling as the throw came in
Cummins to Miller, 1 run cutter from Cummins, comes down and flicks through square leg for one
Cummins to van der Dussen, 1 run short ball, wide of the stumps with RVD? set back and he can only hoick it leg side for a single
Cummins to Miller, no run beautifully bowled, slower ball in the channel and it spins and dips away from Miller as he steps out and swipes at thin air
Cummins to Miller, 1 run short ball, pace off again and it's plinked down to long-off with a horizontal bat, all huff and no puff
Cummins to van der Dussen, no run another slowie, wide of off stump and van der Dussen plays and misses - just four off the over, Postman Pat delivers
Kane Richardson to Miller, 1 run short ball, pace off once again, Miller blaps it through the covers for a single
Kane Richardson to van der Dussen, 2 runs pitched up and crunched towards wide long-on, they hustle well for a second
Kane Richardson to van der Dussen, 1 run short in the channel and van der Dussen latches on to a meaty slap down the ground, long-off is in place
Kane Richardson to Miller, no run pace off in the channel and Miller again fails to read it, swings hard and misses
Kane Richardson to Miller, 1 run pitched up, full and wide and slugged to long-on

Kane Richardson to van der Dussen, OUT Rassie holes out to deep square leg! The legcutter does the job again, nothing for van der Dussen to work with as he swings for the pickets, safely taken a few yards in from the rope
Starc to Miller, 2 runs pitched up and whipped away leg side for a couple
Starc to Miller, 1 run another low full toss from Starc, he's only able to heave it down the ground for one

Starc to van Biljon, FOUR runs full outside off, van Biljon plays an audacious sweep-scoop through backward square leg... and Richardson misfields to gift them four! First boundary in a while, and the crowd don't mind seeing it come via a cock-up
Starc to van Biljon, 1 run pitched up and slapped through the off side
Starc to Miller, 1 run full outside off, 141kph/88mph and Miller can only swing it for another single leg side. He's been all at sea out there

Starc to van Biljon, 2 runs humped over the off side, heading for six, until Smith intercepts running around... he's heading out of bounds, so tosses it up to complete the relay, but trips on the boundary marker! Saved a few, fabulous effort once again from Smiffy in the deep, but it denies Starc a wicket to finish
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run fuller around off, comes forward and presents the full face, rolls towards mid-off
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length ball on the leg stump, tucked away behind square leg
Starc to S Dhawan, no run fuller around off, pushes with hard hands, the ball hits the inner half and goes towards square leg
Starc to S Dhawan, no run length outside off, comes forward and taps it towards point

Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length, angling across, Dhawan goes for a drive on the up, looking to hit squarer, misses
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run short of length around fifth stump, left alone
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length ball in the channel once again, shouldered arms
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length, just around off, a big front-foot stride and a solid defence
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run bangs it short this time, just outside off and angling away, Dhawan stays away from it
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run and that's a maiden. A testing over. This was on a length around fourth stump, Dhawan watches it closely before shouldering arms
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball down the leg side, Rohit misses out on the flick, off the thigh pad and into the mitts of Carey
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball around middle, 138kph, defended on the leg side

Starc to Rohit Sharma, OUT Warner takes a low catch at mid-off. Cross seam and not that full, was angling away from the batsman. Rohit looks to hit it down the ground but it comes slower off the surface. The bat faces closes a touch too early as well. As a result it goes tamely towards Warner, just carrying to him. Think Rohit was looking to go over extra cover
Starc to Rahul, no run length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
Starc to Rahul, no run length ball around fifth stump, left alone
Starc to Rahul, FOUR runs goes for the yorker, 143.1kph, but doesn't get the line right. Down the leg side and Rahul just clips it towards the fine leg boundary

Cummins to S Dhawan, 1 run just short of an incoming Zampa from third man. Was banged in short, Dhawan arches back and ramps it over. Zampa moves forward and to his right but it falls just in front of him
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards fine leg, more work for Zampa
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run short of length around off, stays back and punches it towards point
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length around off, comes forward and drives it towards mid-off, a good-looking short for no runs

Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length again, Dhawan looks to flick it on the leg side, misses and is hit on the pads. An appeal for lbw but looked like it pitched outside leg, Australia want to review. Front foot is fine, no bat involved but as expected, it had landed outside leg . Australia lose their review
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length around leg stump once again, this one just holds it line to hit Dhawan in the abdomen
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run length ball around off, looks to punch through covers, gets an inside edge onto the pads that ricochets on the leg side
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run length ball around off, pushes it towards cover
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run short of length at the batsman, Dhawan goes back and whips it towards short midwicket
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run a touch fuller around off, drives it to the right of Warner at mid-off, a direct hit would have been interesting
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards square leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run length ball around off, stays back and defends with a straight bat
Starc to S Dhawan, no run a searing yorker, just outside off, Dhawan stays inside the line and looks to get his bat down. Beaten as the ball just shapes away
Starc to S Dhawan, no run yorker again, this time at the stumps, Dhawan manages to get his bat on it, squeezes it out towards covers
Starc to S Dhawan, FOUR runs pitched up once more, Dhawan takes a couple of steps towards the bowler and drives it between the non-striker and mid-on

Starc to S Dhawan, FOUR runs fuller and flicked this time, was in the air and not far away from a flying Labuschagne at short midwicket, might have got his fingertips as well but Dhawan had got enough on it to carry it to the fence. Yes, Labuschagne got some hand to it
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run fuller outside off, goes for the drive but fails to middle, gets a single to mid-off
Starc to Rahul, no run length ball angling away from Rahul, shouldered arms
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, FOUR runs short of length, Dhawan goes back and pulls it wide of long-on, three fours for him in last four balls
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run length ball around off, hops back and defends
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run length ball around off, pushes it towards covers
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, FOUR runs this is poor from Richardson. Short and down the leg side with third man in the ring. Dhawan happily pulls it past that fielder and picks up another boundary
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run much better, short of length around off, stays back and chops it towards point
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run length ball around middle, comes forward and defends it towards the bowler
Cummins to Rahul, no run short of length around off, gets on his toes and defends
Cummins to Rahul, 1 run short of length outside off, looked like Rahul was in two minds for a moment, whether to play or leave. Dabs it past slip in the end
Cummins to S Dhawan, FOUR runs fuller around off, and Dhawan is looking imperious now. Drives it to the right of the diving Warner at mid-off
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length but way outside off, left alone
Cummins to S Dhawan, 1 run short of length on the pads, tucked away towards fine leg

Cummins to Rahul, 1 run fuller on the pads, flicked towards short midwicket, Labuschagne makes a partial stop and deflects it towards the mid-on but the fielder there was already moving to his right to cover Labuschagne. The batsmen eventually take a single
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run fuller around off, just short of a yorker, punches it towards mid-on
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run fuller outside off, goes for the drive but cannot beat the extra cover fielder
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run fuller on the pads, flicked to the left of fine leg, Cummins moves across swiftly to keep it to one
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, no run length ball around off, stays in his crease and defends it towards mid-off
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run slower one, 117kph, fuller on the stumps, flicks it towards fine leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run length ball around off, punches towards mid-off
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length ball around off, dabs it on the off side and looks to sneak in but both the point and the cover fielders were quick to the ball

Cummins to S Dhawan, no run extra bounce for Cummins to beat Dhawan's attempted cut. Was a length ball around off, Dhawan went for it but no connection. There was an appeal for caught-behind from Cummins but no bat there
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run short of length around off, once again rising towards the batsman, stays back and defends it on the off side
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run fuller around off, punched firmly but cannot beat mid-off
Cummins to S Dhawan, FOUR runs short of length outside off, Dhawan takes half a step towards the leg side and ramps it over. Made sure he hit it away from the third man fielder this time
Cummins to S Dhawan, FOUR runs this time to the left of the third man. Short of length outside off, steered it behind point to finsih the over with back-to-back four
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run tossed up around off, comes forward and drives it towards sweeper cover
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run fuller and on the pads, flicked towards deep-backward square leg
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run fuller on the leg stump, driven towards long-on for another easy single
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run fuller on middle and leg, Dhawan pushes it towards deep midwicket
Zampa to Rahul, no run too full outside off, looks to squeeze it out fine, misses
Zampa to Rahul, no run length ball on middle and leg, defended from the front foot
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 wide fuller but way too outside off, Dhawan ignores it
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, FOUR runs length ball around off, punched square off the wicket, beating the backward point fielder and 50-run stand - off 54 balls - comes off with that four
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run length ball on middle and leg, tucked away towards square leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run length ball around off, defended towards covers this time
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run almost dabbed on to his stumps, a length ball around off, Rahul looks to defend with soft hands, off the face of the bat and onto the pads
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run length ball around off, looks to push towards covers, an inside edge towards square leg

Zampa to Rahul, FOUR runs fuller outside off, bowled from wide of the crease. Rahul looks to drive through extra cover. Gets a thick outside edge but does well to open the face of the bat so that the ball goes to the right of short third man
Zampa to Rahul, 1 wide length ball but sliding down the leg side
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run fuller around off, pushes it towards the sweeper cover from the front foot
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run fuller on the stumps, driven back towards the bowler
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run length ball around off, comes forward and defends it towards cover
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run length around off, defended again on the off side
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run short of length, Dhawan rocks back and pulls but cannot get the timing right. Short midwicket makes the stop
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run shortish in length, and slanting down the leg side, and he whips it along the ground towards fine leg
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run down the leg side, and he helps it along towards fine leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, no run length, slants into him, and he defends towards square leg
Kane Richardson to Rahul, FOUR runs down the leg side, and he places this to the left of fine leg. Just a little roll of the wrists, and he knows he has placed this well enough. Top shot!
Kane Richardson to Rahul, 1 run drives a length ball, leaning forward. It eludes the grasp of cover, who makes a half-stop. Easy single
Kane Richardson to S Dhawan, 1 run cutter, around his pads, and he whips it off his pads towards fine leg
Agar to S Dhawan, no run floated up to middle, and he sweeps this hard. Cannot get it past short fine leg
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, angles across him before it straightens, and he blocks it
Agar to S Dhawan, no run chips down the wicket and tries to flick a length ball away. Cannot beat Finch at mid-wicket
Agar to S Dhawan, FOUR runs full ball, down the leg side, and he plays a little paddle sweep fine enough. Easy pickings, and bad ball!

Agar to S Dhawan, 2 runs slower, around off stump, and he nurdles it around the corner. Man at deep backward square leg has to run around to his left and pick it up near the long leg boundary, and they come through for the second

Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, and he plays this towards mid-off. He sets off, and then stops. Rahul stops after coming a few steps down the track. Dhawan can regain his composure and recover ground before the throw comes in at his end.
Zampa to Rahul, 2 runs short, and he goes back and cuts this hard. Gets it past point, but the man at the deep point fence is able to cut it off
Zampa to Rahul, no run floated in from deeper behind the popping crease, and he whips it towards mid-wicket
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run full, wide of off, and he slaps this hard towards the sweeper at deep point
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run full, around leg stump, and he looks to sweep. Cannot place it beyond short fine-leg
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run down the leg side, and he looks to sweep. Close to being called wide, but it might have just nicked part of his leg
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run wrong 'un, and he goes back and punches this towards long-on
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, turns back in from outside off, and he tries a delicate late cut. Cannot beat short third man
Agar to S Dhawan, 2 runs fuller, wider, and he runs it down towards deep point with a little flourish of the wrists. Fielded by deep backward point, away to his right
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, around off and middle, and he whips it away but straight towards square leg
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, and he presses forward to drive it back towards the bowler
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run steps out, and looks to slog this down the ground. Runs off the inner part of the bat and runs along the ground to long-on
Agar to Rahul, no run length, and he presses forward to defend this. Runs towards point, and he comes four-five steps down the wicket before being sent back
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run length, down the leg side, and he whips it away towards long leg. That's 50 for Dhawan!
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run length, driven down towards long-on
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run driven back to the bowler
Zampa to S Dhawan, FOUR runs slogs a fuller ball away towards deep mid-wicket. Does well to keep it well to the right of deep backward square
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run fuller, and he stretches forward to drive this down towards long-off
Zampa to Rahul, no run length, and he drives this towards cover
Agar to S Dhawan, no run length, and he shuffles across to whip this away. Misses out on contact
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run dropped, but what an effort! Full ball, and he slaps it away low towards mid-wicket, where Warner dives to his right. Gets his fingers to it, but cannot hold on
Agar to Rahul, 1 run leans back and punches this towards the sweeper at extra cover
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run length, and he moves around the crease, before tapping this towards short third man
Agar to Rahul, 1 run fuller, a touch wider, and he steers this past point towards the man at deep point
Agar to S Dhawan, 1 run flatter, straighter, and he goes back and punches this towards long-on
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, just around off, and he looks to whip this towards mid-wicket. Miscues a touch, but it goes along the ground towards long leg
Zampa to Rahul, 1 run full, and he drives this back towards long-on
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run length, and he comes down the wicket and punches this back down the wicket. Fielded by Zampa away to his left
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run drives back towards the bowler, who stops it well to his right

5.15pm A decent start followed by a middle-overs collapse before a brief rescue act by the lower order. Dhawan top-scored with 74 but India were all out for 255 in 49.1 overs. Starc picked up 3 for 56, and bowled eight yorkers in the game. He has never bowled that many in an ODI, Bharath tells me. Starc reckons the dew may make the ball come easier onto the bat in the second innings. We will be back with the chase
We're at the start of a new decade, but the ISL remains as dramatic as ever, with mini-brawls, sackings, fiery tweets and of course, a certain player from Bengaluru FC doing what he does best.

5.40pm Back for the chase, not long from now. KL Rahul has the wicketkeeping pads on. That's an interesting update. India will look for quick wickets, and I also think scoring becomes a bit tougher on this pitch once the ball softens a bit. Lots to play for just yet

Shami to Warner, no run length, driven back towards Shami, who picks it up on his follow-through
